inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient is diagnosed with the migraine headache and is under treatment.

inclusion.criterion: Barcelona Clinic Liver Cancer stage C or stage B if you cannot tolerate or failed TACE
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No cirrhosis or Child-Pugh A cirrhosis
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: There is nothing remarkable in her physical exam.

inclusion.criterion: All acute toxic effects of any prior treatment have resolved to NCI-CTCAE v4.0 grade 1 or less
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The attacks are associated with nausea and photophobia.

inclusion.criterion: Able to swallow and retain oral medication
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Her BMI is 21 with the BP of 100/60.

notes: The patient is a 15 year old girl with the history of recurrent bilateral headache. She recently noticed that there are more attacks around her menstrual period.
